availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William Wason (Kenton County, Kentucky, merchant and grocery store owner.)

body.p: Kenton County, Kentucky, merchant and grocery store owner. Pennsylvania native. Married to Frances J. P. Wason. Guardian of Samuella Reno and Sarah “Sally” Frances Hawley. Merchant in Kenton County in 1850. Employed Jerry Marsh as a clerk in 1850. Grocery store owner in Kenton County in 1860.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington Ward 6, p. 825.
